list.description:
Strv 122 Series custom sight

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.


For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find me in this discord server: RUzarfS4ua

Check up my profile for other custom sights for different vehicles and nations.

Challenger 2 Series custom sight pack

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.

!WARNING! There is a different L27A1 sight for 2E due to the different optic FOV.

For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find me in this discord server: RUzarfS4ua

Check up my profile for other custom sights for different vehicles and nations.

Object 292 sights for simulator battles.

Decided to make a sight that shows ballistics for both HE and darts for object 292, since there were no sim sight at the time.

Artwork and skin by nouxKL ( https://live.warthunder.com/post/1096861/en/ )

https://images-live.warthunder.com/b99/262/bd645eb397abddf4b1d8793fcf07402a67.png

Tip on using the sight if you never used a sim sight:

The sight features ballistics for both darts and HE as mentioned above (reffer to image above) up to 400 meters for HE, represented by the chevrons past 50m. Darts go up...

Hello War Thunder players! This is a sight pack for the entire premium tree of USSR/Russia. And really big thank to @Rastmust for his T-72AV, 2S38 and T-72M2 sights (I'll make my own versions but I don't know when~~). Some premium vehicles don't have sights yet due to no documents or be hidden but I'll update for them later!
If you have any problems with my sights, please contact me and I'll try to support you!
Enjoy and have a good time!

* Note:
- The TV sights only work normally in 1080p :(
- 20/12/2025: Added sights for BMPT-72.
- 05/07/2025: Add...

SIMPLIFIED USSR RANK VIII VEHICLE SIGHTS
Tested on 1080p only

Current vehicles present in this pack:

  • T-80BVM
  • T-90M
  • Pantsir-S1


Sights are based off of found manuals, images and footage.

Source: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/

#sight #ussr #russian

Sunaōkami Shiroko User Sight

be available for all merkava variations.

added raam segol

#blue_archive #anime

#ptz89 #object122_tm

CN - PTZ98/Object122III Sights
Zoom : 3.5x - 7.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_ptz_89

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_ptz_89

#il2 #il2m #ussr #russia #plane #rocket #collimator #sight #il10 #rbs132 #il21941 #il21942 #il2m82 #il2type3 #il2type5 #il10_1946 #china

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

SPECIAL THANKS TO Хельсинг FOR ALL THE TESTING!!!

Gun and rocket sight for the IL-2 and IL-10 model planes. IL-2 models are to be used with RBS-132 rockets, and IL-10 models are set to use any rockets with corresponding sights. Dive angle should be medium (between 25-35 degrees), and sp...

Ogaden war pack (1977)

For T-34-85, T-54, T-55, M41 and M47.

Description corrupted. I'll fix it later.

Simple custom gunsight for all tanks.

Includes 6km and 3km versions, as well as 3 font size options.

Installation instructions included in readme - just add these 6 files to your \WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks and you are ready to go.

#alltanks

#sight #universal
Sight I found a while back at reddit ( I think it was from SpartanulPH but I'm not sure ), slightly modified by me to my liking with rangefinder added on top ( from Minedeployder ).

2 Version available for good and bad zoom, not reccomended for very high velocity guns.

I'm using 2k monitor so you may have to adjust rangefinder numbers, for that use notepad++ and open file with it. Ctrl+F "size:r" and modify the number to your preference ( you can use the swap all function to do it all at once ).

Object 292 custom sight

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.

!WARNING! I have updated the sight on 16/02/2024 with the correct shell name VBM, props to @MisterMikeBison . If you have an older sight you need to download the sight again and delete the old one to have the correct ammo designation.


For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find me in this discord server: RUzarfS4ua

Check up my profile for...

Basically some people have difficulties focusing their vision on an object, which in this case is center of screen.
This sight reticle should help them decrease aiming time and have overall better target tracking.

How original author of crosshair explained it: "The lines guide your eyes to the crosshair, which can be lost in the visual chaos for some people."
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kRHBRyNS6D8
(btw all credits for design of sight is to author of video. He even distributed all of his source files, so it was much easier to recreate in War Thunder)

Install: Co...

How to install?
1. Extract the ZIP file
2. Put blk file to the Warthunder game folder - Usersights - all_sights

#universal #alltanks

This variant has central range markings enabled.

#US #USA #HVAR #f82 #f82e #plane #collimator #sight #twin_mustang #mustang

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Gun and rocket collimator sights for the US F-82e Twin Mustang. Sights are a little different for this one, as they follow a path and have marked distances along it. The HVAR sight's gun stops at 1000m while the regular sights to 2000m. To best use the HVARS, take either a 1 or 3 rocket load, NOT all 5. Dive at 50-60 degrees and launch around 600m for a good hit.

#aft09

BF2 - CN - HJ8(TOW??) - AFT09 Sight

Zoom :3.0x - 12.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_hj_9

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_hj_9

Sight for T-64A (1971), which should work on T-72A as well.

Features:

  • Cleaned gun-correction ticks for quick adjustments
  • A series of reticles for estimating distances of 3.3m-width targets, slightly compensating the rangefinder disadvantage when speed is needed
  • Minimized number of elements for slightly better vision under the awkward 8X optics
  • A TPD-like layout with points of fall for 7.62mm MG - might be useful?
  • 2 versions with different colors available - one with light gre...

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Collimator sight for the A26B-10 and A26B-50 ground attackers. The A26B-50 sight includes a rocket sight for the HVARS. The first HVARS will always fire more outside, and the last HVARS will fire more inside. The outer boxes are for rocket engagements 300m and less, and the inner boxes are for 600m.
